txt.en: Explore Adkhât-zahhar, the Houses of Rest

You have explored Mur Shatraug, the Witch-gate. Mur Shatraug was built into the mountainside by the Angmarim long ago, by which path they were able to enter Gundabad via a tunnel that bored into the highest reaches of the Pit of Stonejaws.
You have explored Shakhajât. Once a great Orc-hold in the Pit of Stonejaws, long the seat of the chiefs such as Bolg. Now the fortress is ruled by the hobgoblins of the North.
You have explored Borkordh. The old mining cavern has been taken by drakes of the Frost-horde.
You have explored Stazg Vozag. The great numbers of hobgoblins who come to Gundabad camp in and around the fortress of Shakhajât.
You have explored Adkhât-zahhar, the Houses of Rest. The highest of the tombs houses the bones of Gundabad’s lords.
Explore the many interesting locations to be found within the Pit of Stonejaws.
You have explored Bárgstad. The dwarf encampment of Bárgstad was established by Scout-master Ausma.
Explore the many interesting locations to be found within the Pit of Stonejaws.
You have explored Akhaldarâg. On route to the Houses of Rest, the tombs of Akhaldarâg carry the bodies of many noble dwarves who called Gundabad home.
